abstract: The composer and lyricist Stephen Sondheim was enlisted to devise a treasure hunt at the American Museum of Natural History for a charity. Later, he managed to hide himself, too.
snippet: The composer and lyricist Stephen Sondheim was enlisted to devise a treasure hunt at the American Museum of Natural History for a charity. Later, he managed to hide himself, too.
lead_paragraph: There were really two treasure hunts at the American Museum of Natural History on Monday night. City Room failed at both.

headline.main: At the Museum, Hunting Treasure and the Man Who Hid It
